machines.name: ftp-archive-server
machines.role: Corporate FTP archive server with historical documents and hidden configuration files

machines.name: attacker-workstation
machines.role: Network penetration testing workstation with FTP analysis tools

dependencies: Attacker must discover FTP service through network reconnaissance
FTP anonymous access reveals configuration files with encrypted credentials
Decrypted credentials provide access to restricted FTP directories containing the flag

scenario.title: Corporate Archive Infiltration
scenario.description: A corporate FTP server hosts archived documents and backup files. The server appears to allow anonymous access, but the real treasure lies in discovering hidden credentials and decrypting access to restricted directories.
stages: Network reconnaissance to discover FTP service on target server
Anonymous FTP enumeration to discover accessible files and directories
Analysis of configuration files to extract encrypted credentials
Credential decryption using discovered cipher keys
Authenticated FTP access to restricted directories to retrieve the flag
